General.Name: M31 Technology Corp
General.Description: M31 Technology Corporation provides silicon intellectual property (IP) design services in the integrated circuit industry. The company's IP solutions include foundation IP, high speed interface IP, analog IP, and IP integration services. Its products are applied in artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, automotive, CPU, display, and storage applications. M31 Technology Corporation was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.
